test-case.name: op-numeric-subtractmix2args-1
test-case.description: Simple subtraction test with () as one operand should return null

test-case.description: Simple subtraction test pass string for second operator

test-case.description: Simple subtraction test, second operator cast string to integer

test-case.name: op-numeric-subtractmix2args-4
test-case.description: Simple subtraction test, second operator is a node, atomization applied

test-case.name: op-numeric-subtractmix2args-5
test-case.description: Simple subtraction test, second operator is a node, atomization applied

test-case.description: Simple subtraction test, second operator node which is not atomizable

test-case.description: Simple subtraction test, two operands are nodes

test-case.description: Simple subtraction test pass an empty node for second operator

test-case.name: K-NumericSubtract-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:double(6) - xs:double(2) eq 4`.

test-case.name: K-NumericSubtract-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:decimal(6) - xs:decimal(2) eq 4`.

test-case.name: K-NumericSubtract-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:integer(6) - xs:integer(2) eq 4`.

test-case.name: K-NumericSubtract-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:float(5) - xs:float(1) eq 4`.

test-case.name: K-NumericSubtract-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:decimal(6) - xs:integer(2)) instance of xs:decimal`.

test-case.name: K-NumericSubtract-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:integer(6) - xs:decimal(2)) instance of xs:decimal`.

test-case.name: K-NumericSubtract-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:integer(6) - xs:integer(2)) instance of xs:integer`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:decimal(6) - xs:decimal(2)) instance of xs:decimal`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:float(6) - xs:integer(2)) instance of xs:float`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:integer(6) - xs:float(2)) instance of xs:float`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:float(6) - xs:float(2)) instance of xs:float`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:decimal(6) - xs:double(2)) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(xs:float("NaN") - 3) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-NumericSubtract-22
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(xs:double("NaN") - 3) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(3 - xs:float("NaN")) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.description: Invoke the '-' operator with invalid operands.

test-case.description: Invoke the '-' operator with invalid operands.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:untypedAtomic("3") - 3) eq 0`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(3 - xs:untypedAtomic("3")) eq 0`.

test-case.description: Operand(s) which are the empty sequence.

test-case.description: Operand(s) which are the empty sequence.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:untypedAtomic("3") - xs:untypedAtomic("3")) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:untypedAtomic("3") - 1.1) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.description: Substracting zero, with complex operands. Implementations supporting the static typing feature may raise XPTY0004.

test-case.description: Adding zero, with complex operands. Implementations supporting the static typing feature may raise XPTY0004.

test-case.name: K-NumericSubtract-38
test-case.description: Adding zero, with complex operands. Implementations supporting the static typing feature may raise XPTY0004.

test-case.name: K2-NumericSubtract-1
test-case.description: Substract xs:double(0) from xs:integer(0).

test-case.name: K2-NumericSubtract-2
test-case.description: Substract xs:double(0) from xs:integer(0).

test-case.name: op-numeric-subtract-1
test-case.description: Check dynamic type of numeric subtract on arguments of union of numeric types and untypedAtomic.
test-case.result-string: xs:string("integer decimal float double double decimal decimal float double double float float float double double double double double double double double double double double double")

result.assert-string-value: integer decimal float double double decimal decimal float double double float float float double double double double double double double double double double double double

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-subtract-001
test-case.description: test subtraction of large xs:decimal

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-subtract-002
test-case.description: test subtraction of large xs:integer

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-subtract-003
test-case.description: test subtraction of xs:decimal 0
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:decimal) as xs:decimal { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7.5) - 0.0

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-subtract-004
test-case.description: test subtraction of xs:integer 0
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:integer) as xs:integer { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7) - 0

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-subtract-005
test-case.description: ensure that subtracting xs:integers returns an xs:integer
test-case.test: declare function local:integer($x as xs:decimal) { if ($x mod 1 eq 0) then xs:integer($x) else $x }; (local:integer(2) - local:integer(2)) instance of xs:integer

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-subtract-006
test-case.description: test subtraction of negated integers
test-case.test: declare function local:integer($x as xs:decimal) { if ($x mod 1 eq 0) then xs:integer($x) else $x }; -(local:integer(2)) - -(local:integer(4))

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-subtract-007
test-case.description: test subtraction of negated integers
test-case.test: declare function local:integer($x as xs:decimal) { if ($x mod 1 eq 0) then xs:integer($x) else $x }; local:integer(2) - -(local:integer(4))

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-subtract-008
test-case.description: test subtraction of negated integers
test-case.test: declare function local:integer($x as xs:decimal) { if ($x mod 1 eq 0) then xs:integer($x) else $x }; -(local:integer(2)) - local:integer(4)

test-case.name: op-numeric-subtract-big-01
test-case.description: test subtraction of large xs:decimal
